item.title: About
item.description: I’m (Mohammed) Naseer Ahmed, proud father of two kids and an embedded software developer based in Toronto, Canada. I currently work at Qualcomm on Linux/Android display HALs. I love following trends in technology and am especially interested in Mobile Devices, IoT, Graphics, Display. I like to explore nature, hike and fish. I update this site very infrequently on random things that interest me.
